H0.text: What is the scientific name given to tea. Camellia sinensis

H1.text: What is the scientific name given to tea. Thea assamica

H2.text: What is the scientific name given to tea. Camellia japonica

H3.text: What is the scientific name given to tea. Tea Plant

A4.text: Camellia sinensis is a species of evergreen shrub or small tree in the flowering plant family Theaceae.

A5.text: C. s. var. assamica is a variety of Camellia sinensis.
